Name: Pow!
About the game: Great precision puzzles with physics. Your goal is to put the Blue Ball on the target platform for 3 seconds. Configure the timers and positions, then hit play and watch the action! 50 levels 100 Achievements Relaxing music Setup timers Use explosions and vanishing blocks to solve puzzles And make the Blue Ball in contact with the Target Platform for 3 seconfs And remember, each second matters ! Check out the new version /
